page.title: 16A BOY'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I got up at around 9:00,had my breakfast of cornflakes,toast and sausages and watched television.At 9:45 my mum went to work.At about 11:00 my big brother,my dad,my papa and I went to play golf at Caprington Municipal Course while my gran cleaned up the house for my mum.After the golf we went to the Wheatsheaf.The grownups had Tennents lager and the boys had Coca Cola.Then back home for lunch- chicken,salad,egg sandwiches or toast.After lunch Iwatched the football match at Shaw Park until about 4:30
